metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5340 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SumatraPDF 2.1.1/MuPDF 1.0 allows remote attackers to cause an Integer Overflow in the lex_number() function via a corrupt PDF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5340` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.12.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.12.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.0+ds1-1').
